events.name: New York Rangers at Toronto Maple Leafs

headlines.description: — Auston Matthews scored 58 seconds into overtime to give the Toronto Maple Leafs a 2-1 victory over the New York Rangers on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Auston Matthews scores in OT to lift the Maple Leafs past the Rangers, 2-1

headlines.description: — Cole Caufield scored with two seconds left in overtime after tying it with 19.5 to go in regulation, leading the Montreal Canadiens to a 3-2 victory over the Nashville Predators on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Caufield scores tying and winning goals in the Canadiens' 3-2 OT victory over the Predators

headlines.description: — Shane Pinto scored his NHL-leading sixth goal and added the shootout winner in the Ottawa Senators' 4-3 victory over the Seattle Kraken on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pinto scores NHL-leading 6th goal, adds shootout winner in Senators' 4-3 victory over Kraken

events.name: Florida Panthers at New Jersey Devils

headlines.description: — Timo Meier and Nico Hischier scored in the third period and Jake Allen made 21 saves as the New Jersey Devils won their home opener 3-1 over the Florida Panthers on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Meier, Hischier score in 3rd period, Allen stops 21 shots to lift Devils past Panthers 3-1

headlines.description: — Mark Scheifele scored a pair of goals to tie the record for the most career points in Jets franchise history, Connor Hellebuyck made 15 saves, and Winnipeg beat the Philadelphia Flyers 5-2 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Scheifele ties Jets record for career points in win over Flyers

events.name: Colorado Avalanche at Columbus Blue Jackets

headlines.description: — Valeri Nichushkin scored two goals, Scott Wedgewood stopped 22 shots and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Columbus Blue Jackets 4-1 on Thursday night to open the season on a five-game points streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Valeri Nichushkin scores twice, Avalanche beat Blue Jackets 4-1 for fourth win of the season

events.name: Edmonton Oilers at New York Islanders

headlines.description: — Bo Horvat tied it short-handed in the second period, scored the go-ahead goal on the power play and finished off the hat trick with an empty-netter with 8.1 seconds left to help the New York Islanders pick up their first win of the season by...
headlines.shortLinkText: Bo Horvat has a hat trick as the Islanders beat the Oilers 4-2 for their 1st win this season

headlines.description: — Max Sasson scored the last of Vancouver's three goals in a span of 3:26 in the second period and the Canucks rallied from a two-goal deficit to beat the Dallas Stars 5-3 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Max Sasson scores last of Vancouver's 3 quick goals, Canucks rally to beat Stars 5-3

events.name: Boston Bruins at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — William Karlsson scored twice, Pavel Dorofeyev had his NHL-leading sixth goal and Jack Eichel became the first player this season to 10 points as the Vegas Golden Knights held off the Boston Bruins 6-5 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: William Karlsson scores twice to help Golden Knights beat Bruins 6-5

headlines.description: — Seth Jarvis scored his 100th and 101st NHL goals and added an assist, and the Carolina Hurricanes remained the NHL's only unbeaten team with a 4-1 victory over the Anaheim Ducks on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Seth Jarvis scores twice and the Carolina Hurricanes stay unbeaten, beating the Ducks 4-1
